title: Approaches to estimating probability
body:
A state education department is forecasting the impact of a new teacher mentoring initiative. Two analysts produce estimates:
- Analyst A surveys veteran principals and asks them to estimate expected teacher retention improvements.
- Analyst B analyzes five years of statewide teacher attrition data from districts that already implemented mentoring programs.
Both analysts present probability estimates that the initiative will reduce turnover.
courseName: EEPL614 Quantitative Methods for Educational Leadership
